attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian refugees into UK then sort the visa process in safety.
attributes.additional_details: To show humanity and care for this less fortunate than their privileged selves.
attributes.background: To allow those affected by Russian attacks to enter the UK then sort out immigration paperwork, allowing people to flee danger safely and quickly.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open that you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530
